name: SAP ARIBA | Notify Stakeholders on Supplier Sync Status

input.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT RECIPE_ID, INTERFACE_ID, INTERFACE_ERROR, RECORD_METHOD, CREATION_DATE, INTERFACE_STATUS,ARIBA_VENDOR_ID, VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_SITE_CODE
	FROM XXRHFIN.XXRH_SUPPLIER_IMPORT_ALTER_STG
    WHERE RECIPE_ID = :RECIPE_ID and CREATION_DATE > SYSDATE -1

extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable
extended_input_schema.label: Parameters
extended_input_schema.name: parameters

block.name: create_document
block.comment: TABLE for STAGING Details IT Team Template

input.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    RECIPE_ID, 
    VENDOR_SITE_CODE, 
    INTERFACE_ERROR, 
    RECORD_METHOD, 
    VENDOR_NAME, 
    CREATION_DATE, 
    INTERFACE_STATUS, 
    ARIBA_VENDOR_ID, 
    VENDOR_ID, 
    INTERFACE_ID
FROM 
    XXRHFIN.XXRH_SUPPLIER_IMPORT_ALTER_STG
WHERE 
    RECIPE_ID = :RECIPE_ID 
    AND INTERFACE_STATUS <> :INTERFACE_STATUS 
    AND CREATION_DATE > SYSDATE - 1

extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable
extended_input_schema.label: Parameters
extended_input_schema.name: parameters

block.name: send_mail

input.body:
New Supplier Master Record Created

New record has been successfully processed from Workato to Oracle ERP.

Job Started At #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","job_created_at"]}')}
Record Action #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","RECORD_METHOD"]}')}
Ariba Vendor ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","ariba_vendor_id"]}')}
Vendor Name #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","vendor_name"]}')}
Total Site(s) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","total_sites"]}')} Supplier Site(s) details has been recorded to Oracle table
Total Bank(s) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","total_banks"]}')} Supplier Bank(s) details with #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","total_intermediate_banks"]}')} Intermediate Bank(s) has been recorded to Oracle tables
Oracle Request ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","oracle_request_id"]}')}
Oracle ERP Vendor ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","epr_vendor_id"]}')}
Oracle Return Status #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","oracle_return_status"]}')}
Job Completed At #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","job_completed_at"]}')}
#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_template","line":"58f11da8","path":["document"]}')}
input.subject: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"project_property","property_name":"p_workato_instance"}')} - CREATED Record for Supplier Master Successfully

block.name: send_mail

input.subject: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"project_property","property_name":"p_workato_instance"}')} -  Action Required : Submission Partially failed in Oracle for Existing Supplier - #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","ariba_vendor_id"]}')}
input.body:
Hello Team,

We have encountered Oracle Validation failure during processing of this request for Existing Ariba Supplier - #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","vendor_name"]}')}
IT Team is currently reviewing the validation error. Please contact the IT support team if you have urgent questions regarding this request.

Best Regards,

IT Support Team

block.comment: Notify BUSINESS TEAM for Partial Oracle API Failure

block.name: send_mail

input.body:
Supplier Master Record Status: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","RECORD_METHOD"]}')} FAILED.

**Action Required:** The corresponding data **failed to synchronize** from Workato to Oracle ERP. Please review the details below.

Job Started At #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","job_created_at"]}')}
Record Action #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","RECORD_METHOD"]}')}
Ariba Vendor ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","ariba_vendor_id"]}')}
Vendor Name #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","vendor_name"]}')}
Oracle ERP Vendor ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","epr_vendor_id"]}')}
Oracle Request ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","oracle_request_id"]}')}
Oracle Return Status #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","oracle_return_status"]}')}
Total Site(s) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","total_sites"]}')} Supplier Site(s) details attempted.
Total Bank(s) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","total_banks"]}')} Supplier Bank(s) details with #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","total_intermediate_banks"]}')} Intermediate Bank(s) attempted.
Job Failure Time #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","job_completed_at"]}')}
#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_template","line":"58f11da8","path":["document"]}')}
input.subject: =_dp('{"pill_type":"project_property","property_name":"p_workato_instance"}') + "- ACTION REQUIRED: Supplier Creation FAILED - " + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"35ab4805","path":["parameters","ariba_vendor_id"]}')
